text:
Merchbar | San Francisco | Software Engineers - Mid to Senior, Full Stack | Onsite and Remote | Full-time

Merchbar is the marketplace for music merchandise -- we help fans find merch from their favorite artists, and artists reach their fans.

Merchbar’s Engineers are the backbone of Merchbar and each have a personal, direct impact on a product that supports hundreds of thousands of artists and reaches many millions of fans. Our organization is small and individual roles are deep - all of our engineers contribute across the entire stack and develop through all stages of development from scoping and architecture to implementation, scaling and optimization.

Stack: Node (Express.js), Python (Flask), Postgres

→ If interested, please email jobs@merchbar.com or me directly (adam@)

A full job description is available here: https://angel.co/merchbar/jobs/29355-full-stack-software-eng...
